This page describes how to integrate Apache Polaris with Open Policy Agent (OPA) for external authorization. Overviewüîó Open Policy Agent (OPA) is a general-purpose policy engine that enables unified, context-aware policy enforcement across your stack. OPA provides a high-level declarative language (Rego) for authoring policies and APIs to offload policy decision-making from your software.
